entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a student who has returned to Hogwarts. He is described as being brave and having friends with him.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as one of the twins who are part of the Quidditch team. He is described as being confident that they will win the Quidditch Cup.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as one of the twins who are part of the Quidditch team. He is described as being confident that they will win the Quidditch Cup.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as a teacher who has told Fred and George about Harry's good performance in Quidditch.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as someone who thinks he has found a new secret passageway out of the school.

entities.name: gregory the smarmy
entities.description: Gregory the Smarmy is mentioned as the statue behind which Lee Jordan thinks he has found a secret passageway.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who is not welcome and is accompanied by Crabbe and Goyle. He is described as being sarcastic towards Harry.

relationships.description: Fred Weasley is a friend of Harry Potter's and is confident that they will win the Quidditch Cup.
